docs.text: Relative Auto Encoder ¶ Relative latent spaces in auto encoders Installation ¶ pip install git+ssh://git@github.com/lucmos/rae.git Quickstart ¶ Development installation ¶ Setup the development environment: git clone git@github.com:lucmos/rae.git cd rae conda env create -f env.yaml conda activate rae pre-commit install Run the tests: pre-commit run --all-files pytest -v Update the dependencies ¶ Re-install the project in edit mode: pip install -e . [ dev ]
